Translations.Text: Ranhou, fuhuo ri, ta hai yao lingru tamen. Ta jiang shuo:“Nimen ceng yuxin shimen zhenglun de wo de huobanmen [xianzai] zai nali?” Shou ci zhishi zhe jiang shuo:“Jintian, bu xinyang zhe bi shou lingru he tongku de xingfa.

Tianshimen jiang zai tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shi ziji shou sun [gan zui] de qingkuang xia rang tamen siwang.” Tamen jiang [jia] qufu [shuo]:“Women weiceng zuo'e.”[Tianshimen huida shuo]:“Bu! Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi quan zhi de.
Yinci, nimen cong huo yu zhi men jinqu bing yong ju qizhong ba [zhu]! Jiao'ao zi da zhe de guisu zhen elie!”

[Dangshi], you hua sheng dui jingwei zhe shuo:“Nimen de zhu [an la] ceng jiang shi shenme [gei mu sheng]?” Tamen shuo:“Zui hao de [yanci].” Zai jinshi xingshan zhe bi you shan bao, dan houshi de zhuzhai cai shi zui hao de. Jingwei zhe de zhuzhai [leyuan] duo mei a!
Tamen jiang jinru yongjiu de leyuan, zhu he cong qizhong liuguo. Fanshi tamen xiang yao de, tamen zai leyuan li dou neng dedao. An la ruci baochou jingwei zhe.

Tianshimen jiang zai tamen [jingwei zhe] chunzhen wu xie de qingkuang xia rang tamen siwang. Tianshimen [jiang dui tamen] shuo:“Qiu zhu ci nimen ping'an! Nimen yin nimen [zai chenshi] suo zuo de shangong jinru leyuan ba!”

Nandao tamen [bu xinyang zhe] hai zai dengdai tianshimen jianglin tamen [shi tamen siwang], huo ni de zhu de mingling [xingfa huo fuhuo ri] jianglin [tamen] ma? Tamen de qian ren ye ceng zheyang zuo. An la wei kuidai tamen, er shi tamen shi ziji shou sun.
Tamen suo zuo de eguo jianglin tamenle, tamen suo chaoxiao de [xingfa] baowei zhu tamenle.
